virtual void Mesquite::Instruction::initialize_queue ( MeshDomainAssoc *  mesh_and_domain,
const Settings *  settings,
MsqError &  err 
) [pure virtual]

Called for all instructions in queue before loop_over_mesh is called for any insetruction in queue. Default behavior is to do nothing.

Implemented in Mesquite::SlaveBoundaryVertices, Mesquite::TagVertexMesh, Mesquite::MeshTransform, Mesquite::QualityAssessor, Mesquite::QualityImprover, Mesquite::VertexMover, and Mesquite::TargetWriter.

Get string name for use in diagnostic and status output.

Implemented in Mesquite::SlaveBoundaryVertices, Mesquite::TagVertexMesh, Mesquite::MeshTransform, Mesquite::QualityAssessor, Mesquite::ConjugateGradient, Mesquite::FeasibleNewton, Mesquite::NonGradient, Mesquite::NonSmoothDescent, Mesquite::QuasiNewton, Mesquite::SteepestDescent, Mesquite::TrustRegion, Mesquite::LaplacianSmoother, Mesquite::I_DFT_NoBarrierSmoother, Mesquite::NormSquaredSmoother, Mesquite::SmartLaplacianSmoother, Mesquite::Randomize, Mesquite::SmartLaplacianSmoother, and Mesquite::TargetWriter.

void Instruction::initialize_vertex_byte ( MeshDomainAssoc *  mesh_and_domain,
const Settings *  settings,
MsqError &  err 
) [static]

Using data from query methods in MeshInterface or calculating as necessary depending on values in Settings, initialize MSQ_HARD_FIXED and MSQ_SLAVED flags on vertices, and clear MSQ_CULLED flag on all vertices.

Note:
SLAVE_ALL setting is handled in PatchData rather than here for efficiency.
